Containers.Name: binhex-nzbget
Containers.Description: NZBGet is a cross-platform binary newsgrabber for nzb files, written in C++. It supports client/server mode, automatic par-check/-repair, web-interface, command-line interface, etc. NZBGet requires low system resources and runs great on routers, NAS-devices and media players.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where nzbget will store it's configuration file, database and logs.[br] [b]/data[/b] This path is used retrieve the downloaded files by your downloader application.
